doc.field: Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers
Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers

Subseries A: Photographs of Richard Foreman's Productions, includes photographs documenting Richard Foreman's productions including plays he wrote and directed, performance pieces, and his direction of other artist's work. Subseries B: Photographs of Richard Foreman, contains images of Richard Foreman including portraits, commercial images, and candid photographs associated with his professional career. Subseries C: Photographs of Performance Events, documents unscripted performance events such as "The Telephone Event".
Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers
